
Bentuk persamaan polinom dari hasil penyelesaian SPL diatas ialah
P(x) = 7.187114368558477E12-9.347053768198137E12x + 5.334236746195005E12x^2-1.756821037005395E12x^3 + 3.6855304240946783E11x^4-5.113218230009937E10x^5 + 4.695834037424412E9x^6-2.7547614974191624E8x^7 + 9372903.593302948x^8-140994.52465400158x^9
Nilai taksiran : P10(7.51612) = 53540.205078125
P10(8.3225) = 36328.55078125
P10(9.16667) = -664812.9296875
